wikipedia_page.main: Ignatius John O'Brien, 1st Baron Shandon, PC (Ire), KC (31 July 1857 – 10 September 1930), known as Sir Ignatius O'Brien, Bt, between 1916 and 1918, was an Irish lawyer and politician. He served as Lord Chancellor of Ireland between 1913 and 1918.

response: *Ignatius O'Brien, 1st Baron Shandon, Lord Chancellor of Ireland 1913–18
